includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep1 - Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: The West Wing staff spring into action when President Josiah Bartlet is injured in an accident.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The West Wing staff spring into action when President Josiah Bartlet is injured in an accident.

includedAssets.title: Post Hoc, Ergo Propter Hoc
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep2 - Post Hoc, Ergo Propter Hoc
includedAssets.synopsis: After revealing all about his risky liaison, Sam returns to the scene of the encounter. CJ, meanwhile, butts heads with the VP.

includedAssets.title: Five Votes Down
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep4 - Five Votes Down

includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep8 - Enemies

includedAssets.title: What Kind Of Day Has It Been

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: The Bartlet administration battles hard to push through legislation in this first season of the multi-award-winning political drama from Oscar winner Aaron Sorkin. Martin Sheen, Rob Lowe and Allison Janney star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Bartlet administration fights to push through legislation in this first season of the award-winning political drama. Martin Sheen stars.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Bartlet administration battles hard to push through legislation in this first season of the multi-award-winning political drama from Oscar winner Aaron Sorkin. Martin Sheen, Rob Lowe and Allison Janney star.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: The White House team deal with the aftermath of the shooting in this tense second season of the acclaimed political drama. Rob Lowe, Allison Janney and Martin Sheen star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The White House team deal with the aftermath of the shooting in this second season of the acclaimed political drama. Martin Sheen stars.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The White House team deal with the aftermath of the shooting in this tense second season of the acclaimed political drama. Rob Lowe, Allison Janney and Martin Sheen star.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Bartlet makes a big decision as he battles to defend his record in the wake of revelations about his health. Rob Lowe, Allison Janney and Martin Sheen return for the third season of Oscar winner Aaron Sorkin's critically acclaimed political drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Bartlet makes a big decision as he battles to defend his record. Season three of Oscar winner Aaron Sorkin's acclaimed political drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Bartlet makes a big decision as he battles to defend his record in the wake of revelations about his health. Rob Lowe, Allison Janney and Martin Sheen return for the third season of Oscar winner Aaron Sorkin's critically acclaimed political drama.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Bartlet and the team are forced to deal with a series of debilitating controversies and crippling crises as they fight for re-election. Rob Lowe, Allison Janney and Martin Sheen star in Aaron Sorkin's award-winning take on the inner workings of Washington.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Bartlet and the team fight for re-election in season four of Aaron Sorkin's award-winning take on the inner workings of Washington.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Bartlet and the team are forced to deal with a series of debilitating controversies and crippling crises as they fight for re-election. Rob Lowe, Allison Janney and Martin Sheen star in Aaron Sorkin's award-winning take on the inner workings of Washington.

includedAssets.title: Season 5
includedAssets.synopsis: The White House holds its breath as the attempts to rescue Zoe Bartlet continue. Thrilling fifth season of Aaron Sorkin's acclaimed political drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The White House holds its breath as the attempts to rescue Zoe Bartlet continue. Fifth season of Aaron Sorkin's acclaimed political drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The White House holds its breath as the attempts to rescue Zoe Bartlet continue. Thrilling fifth season of Aaron Sorkin's acclaimed political drama.

includedAssets.title: Season 6
includedAssets.synopsis: Bartlet puts his diplomatic skills to the test as he attempts to thrash out a deal between Israel and Palestine, while change is afoot for the White House staff. Season six of the award-winning political drama starring Martin Sheen.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Bartlet attempts to thrash out a Middle-Eastern peace deal, while change is afoot for the White House staff. Season six of the award-winning drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Bartlet puts his diplomatic skills to the test as he attempts to thrash out a deal between Israel and Palestine, while change is afoot for the White House staff. Season six of the award-winning political drama starring Martin Sheen.

includedAssets.title: Season 7
includedAssets.synopsis: Vinick and Santos battle it out to be Bartlet's successor in this final season of the acclaimed political drama from Oscar-winning writer Aaron Sorkin.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Vinick and Santos compete to be Bartlet's successor in this final season of the acclaimed political drama from Oscar-winning writer Aaron Sorkin.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Vinick and Santos battle it out to be Bartlet's successor in this final season of the acclaimed political drama from Oscar-winning writer Aaron Sorkin.

includedIn.title: The West Wing
includedIn.synopsis: The US president and his loyal staff fruitlessly try to keep personal lives and politics separate as they run the most powerful country in the world.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: The US president and his loyal staff fruitlessly try to keep personal lives and politics separate as they run the most powerful country in the world.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: The US president and his loyal staff fruitlessly try to keep personal lives and politics separate as they run the most powerful country in the world.

title: The West Wing Seasons 1-7
synopsis: Martin Sheen is US president Jed Bartlet in Oscar-winning writer Aaron Sorkin's multi-award-winning look into the inner workings of American politics.
shortSynopsis: Martin Sheen is US president Jed Bartlet in Oscar-winning writer Aaron Sorkin's multi-award-winning look into the inner workings of American politics.
mediumSynopsis: Martin Sheen is US president Jed Bartlet in Oscar-winning writer Aaron Sorkin's multi-award-winning look into the inner workings of American politics.
